entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Light snow and local blowing snow ending this morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 60 percent chance of flurries. Clearing this afternoon. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 26 this morning and minus 10 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Increasing cloudiness. High minus 1.
